details.title: Deformation measurement of impulsed plate using dynamic moire method
details.abstract: In this paper, the car damper is simplified as an impulsed plate, and the dynamic deformations of the impulsed plate are measured using the moire method. The experimental method and procedures, as well as the experimental results are discussed in detail. The good experimental results verify the feasibility of studying the damper damage procedure with the single flash dynamic moire method.
